# WEAPON::REMOVE_ALL_PED_WEAPONS

## Summary
Remove all weapons a character has

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** deadCheck = true

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
setting the last params to false it does that same so I would suggest its not a toggle
